entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 7:13 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022
